T

TransactionalContainerWrapper - Class in org.vaadin.data.tx
TransactionalContainerWrapper is a Vaadin Container which wraps around another container to provide transactional commits and rollbacks for item set and property value changes.
TransactionalContainerWrapper(Container.Indexed) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.data.tx.TransactionalContainerWrapper
Creates a new TransactionalContainerWrapper and wraps the given container.
TransactionalContainerWrapper(Container.Indexed, ItemGenerator) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.data.tx.TransactionalContainerWrapper
Creates a new TransactionalContainerWrapper and wraps the given container.
TransactionalContainerWrapper.TxState - Enum in org.vaadin.data.tx
State of the transaction.
transactionCommitted() - Method in interface org.vaadin.data.tx.TxListener
This will be called after a successfull commit.
transactionRolledBack() - Method in interface org.vaadin.data.tx.TxListener
This will be called after pending changes have been rolled back.
transactionStarted(boolean) - Method in interface org.vaadin.data.tx.TxListener
This will be called when a transaction is started.
TxListener - Interface in org.vaadin.data.tx
TxListener is an interface for listening transaction state changes from external code.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum org.vaadin.data.tx.TransactionalContainerWrapper.TxState
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum org.vaadin.data.tx.TransactionalContainerWrapper.TxState
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
